DOC.brief_summary: This large pragmatic multicenter trial compare maintenance general anesthesia total intravenous anesthesia use propofol versus volatile agent ( sevoflurane , isoflurane , desflurane ) cancer surgery . The primary endpoint all-cause mortality .
DOC.brief_title: General Anesthetics CAncer REsection Surgery ( GA-CARES ) Trial
DOC.criteria: Patients know suspected cancer schedule undergo follow oncologic surgical procedure : Lobectomy pneumonectomy Esophagectomy Radical ( total ) cystectomy Pancreatectomy Partial hepatectomy Hyperthermic intraperitoneal chemotherapy ( HIPEC ) Gastrectomy ( subtotal total ) Cholecystectomy bile duct resection Age le 18 year American Society Anesthesiologist Class 5 Projected life expectancy le 30 day Known suspected hypersensitivity either propofol , e.g . egg soy allergy , volatile general anesthetic agent Known suspected history malignant hyperthermia
